ChunkItem Class Reference

The base class for all items resides in a chunk It inherited from SpecialChunkItem to get virtual methods specified to different usage, like client or editor. More...

void toss (Chunk *pChunk)
 This method is the specialised toss method for ChunkItem It makes sure the item is added to the spaces tick list if it wants to be ticked.

Detailed Description

The base class for all items resides in a chunk It inherited from SpecialChunkItem to get virtual methods specified to different usage, like client or editor.

void ChunkItem::toss ( Chunk *  pChunk  )  [virtual]

This method is the specialised toss method for ChunkItem It makes sure the item is added to the spaces tick list if it wants to be ticked.

Parameters:
pChunk the chunk to toss the item into

Reimplemented from ChunkItemBase.
